ch0245_41_mary/0101_0701_01_10:
There’s somethin’ sweet in the air, an’ it’s
pretty excitin’!
ch0245_41_mary/0101_0701_02_10:
Why don’t we go cheer some people
on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0245_41_mary/7101_0701_01_10: This is one of my favorite outfits.
ch0245_41_mary/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s a pretty dress with an apron I tie tight
around me!
ch0245_41_mary/7101_0701_03_10:
When I tie it, it’s like I’m helping the person I’m
cheerin’ on pull it together! An’ it’s
so eye-catchin’.
ch0245_41_mary/7101_0701_04_10:
It’s like my outfit itself is doin’ a cheer. I feel
like my cheerin’s even better when I have it on!
ch0245_41_mary/7102_0701_01_10:
My partner Pokémon lures her opponents into
letting their guard down, then chomps them
right up!
ch0245_41_mary/7102_0701_02_10: She’s not just cute! I can really count on her.
ch0245_41_mary/7102_0701_03_10:
Be careful—ya never know if we’ll try to take a
bite outta ya!
ch0245_41_mary/7103_0701_01_10:
I think it’s best to have a smile on your face when
you’re givin’ someone a present.
ch0245_41_mary/7103_0701_02_10:
That’s why I’ve been practicin’ my smile so much,
but it’s still not as natural as I want it to be...
ch0245_41_mary/7103_0701_03_10: If ya don’t mind, wanna help me practice?
ch0245_41_mary/7104_0701_01_10:
People get excited when there’s something sweet
hangin’ in the air.
ch0245_41_mary/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s why I’m always mindful of how I cheer
people on.
ch0245_41_mary/7104_0701_03_10:
You’ve got to know if someone wants to be
cheered up or if they just wanna feel like
someone’s watchin’ over them.
ch0245_41_mary/7104_0701_04_10:
Ya gotta know the difference to make sure
everyone’s as happy as they can be!
ch0245_41_mary/7105_0701_02_10:
I can’t decide what present to get for my big
bro and the members of Team Yell.
ch0245_41_mary/7105_0701_03_10: Could you help me pick something out?
ch0245_41_mary/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got something good for ya.
ch0245_41_mary/1701_0701_02_10: Don’t be shy! Just take it!
ch0245_41_mary/1701_0702_01_10: I’m glad ya seem to like it!
ch0245_41_mary/2501_0701_01_10: I really like makin’ people happy.
ch0245_41_mary/2501_0701_02_10:
I can do that with my cheers and by passin’ out
sweets I’ve made.
ch0245_41_mary/2501_0701_03_10: If you want something specific, let me know, OK?
ch0245_41_mary/2501_0702_01_10: Just don’t ask for anything too difficult.
ch0245_41_mary/2501_0702_02_10:
It would be so embarrassing if I couldn’t make
it nice.
ch0245_41_mary/2511_0701_01_10: I’m a fan of the rockin’ outfits I usually wear...
ch0245_41_mary/2511_0701_02_10:
But I’ve always envied the really glamorous kind
of fashion you see in big cities.
ch0245_41_mary/2511_0701_03_10:
Right now, I’m happy to be here ’cause I can
check out all kinds of fashion!
ch0245_41_mary/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna go hit the boutiques. Wanna come
with me?
ch0245_41_mary/2511_0702_02_10:
Let’s experiment with all sorts of styles and find
a look that screams “Pasio!”
ch0245_41_mary/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! Don’t tell me you’re still sleepy...
Come on! It’s time to rise an’ shine!
ch0245_41_mary/3003_0701_01_10:
Make sure ya take a break if ya start to feel
tired, all right? I’ll be there to cheer ya on when
you’re ready to go again!
ch0245_41_mary/3005_0701_01_10:
I think we both did great out there today. Now
it’s time to get somethin’ sweet to celebrate an’
do our best again tomorrow!
